title: Fred Armisen, Ana Fabrega and Julio Torres | GOP Reels as Scandal-Ridden MAGA Candidates like Walker and Oz Implode: A Closer Look
description:
Seth takes a closer look at the GOP rallying behind several pro-Trump Senate candidates whose campaigns have been engulfed in scandal as Trump himself continues to face more legal scrutiny over the stolen classified documents he stashed away at Mar-a-Lago.

Then, Fred Armisen, Ana Fabrega and Julio Torres share how they would describe their show Los Espookys, explain the differences between Seasons 1 and 2 and express their hatred for CGI butterflies.

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
